This course will revolutionize your presentation creation workflow by integrating the power of AI through ChatGPT and PowerPoint Designer. You'll learn to leverage cutting-edge AI tools to streamline your process, enhance your design, and ultimately deliver more impactful presentations.


We'll cover a range of techniques, including:

  • Crafting compelling presentation outlines with ChatGPT prompt templates: Learn how to effectively communicate your presentation goals to ChatGPT and generate comprehensive, structured outlines.

  • Enhancing presentation design with PowerPoint Designer: Discover how to utilize PowerPoint Designer to effortlessly elevate the visual appeal of your slides with intelligent design suggestions.

  • Generating complete presentation outlines using ChatGPT: Go beyond basic outlines and have ChatGPT generate fully-fleshed out presentations with text and visual prompts.

  • Moving presentation content from ChatGPT to PowerPoint using VBA: Automate the transfer of your ChatGPT generated content into PowerPoint, saving valuable time and effort.

  • Writing effective ChatGPT prompts for crafting presentation outlines: Master the art of prompt engineering to extract the most relevant and creative outputs from ChatGPT.


Why is this important?

In fast-paced world, the ability to deliver clear, concise, and engaging presentations is a critical skill. AI tools like ChatGPT and PowerPoint Designer are transforming the way we create and deliver presentations. By mastering these tools, you can:

  • Boost your productivity: Automate tedious tasks and generate content quickly, freeing up time for higher-level thinking and strategy.

  • Enhance your creativity: Overcome creative blocks and explore new design possibilities with AI-powered suggestions.

  • Improve your presentation quality: Create more polished, professional, and persuasive presentations that captivate your audience.

  • Gain a competitive edge: Stay ahead of the curve by adopting cutting-edge AI technology and demonstrating your adaptability to new tools.

This course will equip you with the knowledge and skills to harness the power of AI and elevate your presentations to new heights. Join us and unlock the future of presentation creation!

Dive into the amazing world of Brain-Computer Interfaces (BCI) with our course, "Mind Meets Machine: Exploring Brain-Computer Interfaces (BCI)" . Discover how BCIs have evolved from early experiments in the 1950s to the groundbreaking technologies of today .

In this course, you will learn about EEG signals , the electrical waves our brains produce. You'll understand how to use deep neural networks, the powerful tools behind modern AI , and how to extract important features from brain data . By the end of this course, you will have a thorough understanding of the regulatory environment in which banking institutions operate globally and the tools needed to ensure compliance. This knowledge will empower you to navigate the complexities of regulatory compliance confidently and effectively.

In addition to these theoretical insights, you will gain practical knowledge crucial for a career in compliance area. You will be able to identify red flags as a real compliance officer, with the skills needed to detect and address potential compliance issues proactively.


Do you want to build a global career at the Wealth Management, Private Banking and Compliance?

Join our new course from globally recognized experts: Barbara Gutsch (15+ years of international experience in banking and finance, incl. 7+ years in Swiss private banking as risk and compliance manager) and Olga Margolin (17+ years in Swiss private banking industry, as top executive and business owner, managing international client relationships).


Agenda

  • Regulatory Frameworks and Compliance Standards in a Nutshell

  • Key Requirements faced by Banking Institutions

  • Why Compliance Matters? Consequences of Non-Compliance

  • Methods of Risk Mitigation and Prevention of Compliance Violations

  • Emerging Trends and Future Outlook in Regulatory Compliance


Regulatory Compliance refers to an organization's adherence to laws, regulations, guidelines, and specifications relevant to its business processes. These rules can be external (governmental, industry-specific) or internal (company policies).


Importance of Developing Regulatory Compliance Skills for Managers and Companies:

1. Risk Mitigation:

  • Legal and Financial Penalties: Non-compliance can lead to hefty fines, lawsuits, and even criminal charges for managers. By understanding regulations, managers can proactively identify potential risks and ensure compliance, thus safeguarding their companies' financial health.

  • Reputational Damage: Regulatory violations can tarnish a company's reputation, leading to loss of customer trust, decreased sales, and difficulty attracting investors. A manager skilled in compliance can prevent such scenarios.

  • Operational Disruptions: Non-compliance can lead to business interruptions or shutdowns. Managers with a strong compliance background can ensure smooth operations by implementing effective controls and procedures.


2. Strategic Advantage:

  • Competitive Edge: Companies with robust compliance programs are often viewed as more reliable and trustworthy by customers and partners. This can translate to increased business opportunities and market share.

  • Innovation: A deep understanding of regulatory landscapes can help managers identify opportunities for innovative products or services that meet emerging compliance requirements.

  • Investor Confidence: Investors are more likely to invest in companies with strong compliance records, as it demonstrates responsible management and reduces investment risk.


3. Career Advancement for Managers:

  • Increased Employability: Regulatory compliance is a sought-after skill set across industries. Managers who possess this expertise are highly valued and have a broader range of career opportunities.

  • Leadership Roles: Compliance often involves cross-functional collaboration and strategic decision-making, making it an excellent stepping stone to senior management positions.

  • Personal Growth: Staying updated on complex regulations requires continuous learning, which contributes to professional development and enhances a manager's overall skillset.


4. Ethical and Social Responsibility:

  • Protecting Consumers and Employees: Compliance with regulations ensures that products, services, and workplaces are safe for consumers and employees.

  • Sustainability: Many regulations address environmental concerns. Complying with these rules demonstrates a commitment to sustainability and corporate social responsibility.


Developing skills in regulatory compliance is not just a matter of following rules. It's about understanding the broader impact of regulations on businesses and society. By mastering this field, managers can protect their companies, advance their careers, and contribute to a safer and more sustainable business environment.

courseDetails.title: Elevate Your Leadership, Amplify Your Communication Skills
courseDetails.shortDescription: Revamp leadership & amplify communication with this dual-course blend for peak professional growth.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the comprehensive online leadership training course designed to equip you with the essential skills and knowledge to excel as a leader in today's dynamic world. Led by renowned leadership expert Daniel Juma K’Owuoche, this course delves deep into various aspects of leadership and communication, offering valuable insights and practical strategies to help you thrive in your professional journey.

  1. Building Leadership Excellence with Daniel Juma K’Owuoche:

    • Gain valuable insights from Daniel Juma K’Owuoche, a distinguished leader and mentor, on how to cultivate leadership excellence and drive success in your organization.

  2. Differentiating Between Leadership and Management:

    • Understand the fundamental differences between leadership and management roles, and learn how to effectively balance both for organizational success.

  3. Key Characteristics of Effective Leaders:

    • Explore the key traits and attributes that define effective leaders, and discover how to cultivate these qualities within yourself to inspire and motivate your team.

  4. Blame Game or Shared Responsibility? Understanding Accountability:

    • Learn the importance of fostering a culture of accountability within your team, and discover strategies for promoting shared responsibility and accountability for results.

  5. Team Connection Mastery: Unlocking the Power of Effective Leadership:

    • Unlock the secrets to building strong connections with your team members, fostering trust, collaboration, and a sense of belonging for enhanced team performance.

  6. Communicating Effectively as a Leader: Best Practices:

    • Master the art of effective communication as a leader, learning best practices for conveying your message clearly, persuasively, and with impact.

  7. The Nature vs. Nurture Debate in Leadership:

    • Delve into the age-old debate of nature versus nurture in leadership, exploring how both innate qualities and learned behaviors shape effective leadership.

  8. Unlocking the Power of Motivation in Leadership:

    • Discover the importance of motivation in leadership, and explore practical techniques for inspiring and energizing your team to achieve their full potential.

  9. Maslow's Hierarchy of Needs: A Foundation for Leadership:

    • Gain a deep understanding of Maslow's Hierarchy of Needs and its relevance to leadership, and learn how to apply this framework to drive employee engagement and satisfaction.

  10. Unveiling the Management Crop: A Revolutionary Approach to Feedback:

    • Explore innovative approaches to providing feedback as a leader, focusing on constructive feedback that fosters growth and development.

  11. Understanding Motivation: Unraveling Maslow's Hierarchy Through Personality Types:

    • Learn how individual personality types influence motivation and behavior, and discover strategies for effectively motivating diverse teams.

  12. Avoiding the Money Trap: Pitfalls of Monetary Incentives:

    • Understand the limitations of monetary incentives in motivating employees, and explore alternative strategies for fostering engagement and performance.

  13. Mastering Motivation: 20 Essential Techniques for Energizing Your Employees:

    • Equip yourself with a toolbox of 20 essential techniques for motivating and energizing your team, ensuring sustained performance and morale.

  14. The Pillars of Communication:

    • Explore the foundational pillars of effective communication, including clarity, empathy, active listening, and authenticity, essential for building strong relationships and driving success.

  15. Shedding Light on the Communication Process:

    • Gain a deep understanding of the communication process, from encoding and transmission to reception and decoding, and learn how to navigate potential barriers to effective communication.

  16. Strategic Communication: Choosing Channels Wisely:

    • Learn how to strategically select communication channels based on context, audience, and objectives, ensuring your message reaches its intended recipients effectively.

  17. Understanding Channel Richness in Formal Communication:

    • Explore the concept of channel richness in formal communication settings, and learn how to leverage different channels to maximize message clarity and impact.

  18. When to Use Informal Communication Methods: A Practical Guide:

    • Understand the role of informal communication methods in fostering connections and building rapport within your team, and learn when and how to effectively utilize them.

  19. Importance of Understanding Receiver Perspectives:

    • Recognize the significance of considering receiver perspectives in communication, and learn how to tailor your message to resonate with your audience for maximum impact.

  20. The Concept of "Listening Loudly" in Effective Communication:

    • Discover the power of active listening in communication, and learn how to truly "listen loudly" by empathetically engaging with your team members and stakeholders.

  21. Understanding the Role of Questions in Meaningful Conversations:

    • Learn how to ask insightful questions that foster meaningful dialogue and exploration, driving innovation, problem-solving, and collaboration within your team.

  22. Tailoring Communication to Decision-Making Styles:

    • Explore different decision-making styles and learn how to adapt your communication approach to effectively engage stakeholders and facilitate informed decision-making processes.

  23. Strategic Communication: Building Likability and Encouraging Reciprocity:

    • Discover strategies for building likability and fostering reciprocity through strategic communication, enhancing your influence and impact as a leader.

  24. Persuasive Strategies: Applying Social Proof and Consistency for Effective Communication:

    • Master the art of persuasion by leveraging social proof and consistency principles to effectively communicate your ideas, influence decisions, and drive action.

  25. Creating Credible Influence: Harnessing Authority in Persuasion:

    • Learn how to build and leverage your authority to establish credibility and influence others effectively, driving alignment and commitment towards common goals.

  26. Techniques in Verbal Expression:

    • Enhance your verbal communication skills with practical techniques for articulating your message clearly, confidently, and persuasively in various professional contexts.

A pitch deck is a concise and visually engaging presentation that is typically used in business settings to convey a company's or project's key information, value proposition, and investment opportunity. Pitch decks are primarily used when seeking investments, partnerships, or to secure new clients. They serve as a persuasive tool to convey the essence of your business or idea quickly and effectively. A well-crafted pitch deck can make a significant difference in the success of a business, startup, or project.

Here are the key components and the needs of usage for a pitch deck in a business context:

  1. Introduction: Start with a compelling introduction that grabs the audience's attention and provides an overview of your business or project.

  2. Problem Statement: Clearly define the problem or need that your product or service addresses. This sets the stage for why your business is relevant.

  3. Solution: Present your solution and how it addresses the identified problem. Explain how your product or service works and what makes it unique.

  4. Market Opportunity: Describe the market size and potential for your business. This includes the target audience and its demographics.

  5. Business Model: Explain how your business will generate revenue, your pricing strategy, and the sales channels you plan to use.

  6. Traction: Showcase any significant achievements, customer testimonials, or partnerships to build credibility.

  7. Competitive Analysis: Identify your competitors and explain how your business is positioned relative to them. Highlight your competitive advantages.

  8. Team: Introduce your team and their relevant experience. This builds trust and confidence in your ability to execute the business plan.

  9. Financial Projections: Present your financial forecasts, including revenue, expenses, and profitability projections. This demonstrates the potential for a return on investment.

  10. Ask: Clearly state what you are seeking from your audience, whether it's investment, partnership, or something else.


The skills related to pitching, business presenting, and business communication are important for experts and companies for several reasons:

  1. Securing Funding: Effective pitching skills are crucial when seeking investments or funding. A well-presented pitch deck can significantly increase the chances of attracting investors.

  2. Building Credibility: Strong presentation skills can help a company or individual build credibility with clients, partners, and stakeholders. A professional presentation conveys competence and confidence.

  3. Effective Communication: Business communication skills are essential for conveying ideas, plans, and strategies within a company. Clear and persuasive communication can drive team alignment and enhance productivity.

  4. Client Acquisition: In sales and client-facing roles, effective presentation and communication skills can help in acquiring new clients or customers. It can make the difference between a successful pitch and a missed opportunity.

  5. Career Advancement: For individuals, mastering these skills can lead to career advancement. Professionals who can effectively communicate their ideas and lead presentations tend to stand out and progress in their careers.

  6. Team Collaboration: Effective communication and presentation skills are essential for collaboration within teams. They help in conveying objectives, sharing updates, and ensuring everyone is on the same page.


Strong understanding of pitching, business presenting skills, and business communication skills is crucial in today's competitive business environment. These skills not only enable companies to attract investments, win clients, and build credibility but also support the career growth of individuals. A combination of these skills can lead to more successful and impactful business endeavors.

Competitive Analysis: Identify your competitors and explain how your business is positioned relative to them. Highlight your competitive advantages.  Team: Introduce your team and their relevant experience. This builds trust and confidence in your ability to execute the business plan.  Financial Projections: Present your financial forecasts, including revenue, expenses, and profitability projections. This demonstrates the potential for a return on investment.  Ask: Clearly state what you are seeking from your audience, whether it's investment, partnership, or something else.

The skills related to pitching, business presenting, and business communication are important for experts and companies for several reasons:  Securing Funding: Effective pitching skills are crucial when seeking investments or funding. A well-presented pitch deck can significantly increase the chances of attracting investors.  Building Credibility: Strong presentation skills can help a company or individual build credibility with clients, partners, and stakeholders. A professional presentation conveys competence and confidence.  Effective Communication: Business communication skills are essential for conveying ideas, plans, and strategies within a company. Clear and persuasive communication can drive team alignment and enhance productivity.  Client Acquisition: In sales and client-facing roles, effective presentation and communication skills can help in acquiring new clients or customers. It can make the difference between a successful pitch and a missed opportunity.  Career Advancement: For individuals, mastering these skills can lead to career advancement. Professionals who can effectively communicate their ideas and lead presentations tend to stand out and progress in their careers.  Team Collaboration: Effective communication and presentation skills are essential for collaboration within teams. They help in conveying objectives, sharing updates, and ensuring everyone is on the same page.

Strong understanding of pitching, business presenting skills, and business communication skills is crucial in today's competitive business environment. These skills not only enable companies to attract investments, win clients, and build credibility but also support the career growth of individuals. A combination of these skills can lead to more successful and impactful business endeavors.

courseDetails.title: Productivity and Time Management: From Beginner to Expert
courseDetails.shortDescription: Boost Your Productivity: Proven Techniques to Get More Done in Less Time
courseDetails.longDescription:
Struggling to stay productive? Feel like there’s never enough time?

This practical and research-backed productivity course will help you boost efficiency, take control of your time, and achieve more with less effort. Unlike other courses that focus on generic "feel-good" advice, this course is rooted in science, backed by real-world case studies, and packed with actionable strategies to help you increase productivity starting today.


What Makes This Course Unique?


  • Research-Backed Insights – Learn scientifically proven productivity strategies rather than vague concepts.

  • Real-World Case Studies – Discover how high achievers master time management and how you can too.

  • Fun & Engaging Animations – Retain information effortlessly with highly visual learning experiences.


Whether you're a busy professional, entrepreneur, or student, this course will provide you with the tools, techniques, and mindset shifts needed to maximise productivity and create a better work-life balance.


You Will Learn How To:


-  Apply quick wins to instantly increase your productivity.
  - Use the Zeigarnik Effect to stay motivated and finish tasks faster.
  - Develop a productivity mindset and eliminate time-wasting habits.
  - Master time management techniques like Pomodoro, time blocking, and task batching.
  - Overcome perfectionism and procrastination to get things done.

  - Learn the science of habit formation, the habit loop and how to break bad habits without relying solely on willpower
  - Use the best productivity apps to streamline tasks and save hours daily.


1. Productivity Quick Wins & The Zeigarnik Effect

Start your productivity transformation with instant, research-backed quick wins! Learn how the Zeigarnik Effect creates cognitive tension that keeps you engaged and focused, and how the Progress Principle helps you maintain momentum by celebrating small wins.


2. The Productive Mindset & Productivity Killers


What sets highly productive people apart? We explore the psychology of productivity and uncover common time-wasters that sabotage efficiency. You'll also discover proven methods to break bad habits, overcome distractions, and stay focused.


3. Mastering Time Management: The Best Techniques


  • Time is your most valuable asset! Learn and apply powerful time management techniques used by top professionals

  • The Pomodoro Technique – Stay sharp and productive with time-controlled sprints.

  • Time Blocking – Take back control of your schedule and eliminate distractions.

  • The 80/20 Pareto Rule – Discover how 20% of your efforts yield the 80% of results of vice versa.

  • Task Batching – Organize similar tasks together for maximum efficiency.

  • Parkinson's Law – Lean how work expands to fill available time and strategies to leverage Parkinson's Law


4. Learn the Science of habit formation


  • Learn about the Habit Loop – Discover how triggers lead to actions which lead to reward and why habits are hard to break

  • Breaking Bad Habits – Learn to design systems and checks which will help you break bad habits scientifically, without just relying on your willpower

  • Don't Break the Chain – Learn the popular comedian Jerry Seinfeld's technique of habit formation

  • Building Good Habits – Learn the science behind building good habits


5. The Best Productivity Apps & Tools


Find out which productivity apps can automate tasks, track progress, and enhance focus. These tools are used by millions worldwide to boost efficiency!


Why Enroll in This Course?


  • Actionable & Practical – No fluff, just proven methods that work.

  • Science-Backed & Research-Driven – Learn strategies based on real studies.

  • Designed for All Levels – Whether you're a beginner or already productivity-savvy, this course has something for you.

Ready to take control of your time and skyrocket your productivity? Join now and start your transformation today!
targetAudiences: Busy professionals looking to improve productivity and manage their time effectively
Entrepreneurs and freelancers seeking to balance multiple tasks and projects
Students aiming to enhance focus, beat procrastination, and excel academically
Anyone looking to develop better habits, stay organized, and achieve work-life balance

Course Author:

Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.

In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses on to wide range of students from undergraduate level to business students of professional and executives courses. Currently, at EIMT in Zurich, Switzerland, she lectures for doctoral students, offering advanced instruction in research design and methodologies, and in MTF Institute Ms. Amoroso is leading Product Development academical domain.

In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.

Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.


Product Management

Product Management is a multifaceted discipline that encompasses the planning, development, marketing, and optimization of a product or service throughout its lifecycle. It involves aligning customer needs with business goals and coordinating cross-functional teams to deliver successful and valuable products. Product managers act as the linchpin between various departments, ensuring seamless communication and collaboration.


Customer experience (CX) is the overall impression customers have of your brand throughout their interactions with your business. It encompasses everything from the initial marketing message to the post-purchase support they receive. Think of it as the customer journey, and CX is all the touchpoints along the way that shape their perception.


Key Areas of CX

  • Customer touchpoints: Every interaction a customer has with your brand, like websites, social media, advertising, in-store experience, and customer service.

  • Customer journey: Mapping out the steps a customer takes to interact with your brand, from awareness to purchase and beyond.

  • Customer satisfaction: How happy customers are with your product or service.

  • Customer loyalty: How likely customers are to return and recommend your brand to others.


CX Frameworks

Frameworks provide a structured approach to improving CX. Here are two common ones:

  • Customer Experience Journey Map: A visual representation of the customer journey, identifying touchpoints and opportunities for improvement.

  • Five Service Dimensions: A framework that focuses on five key aspects of service quality: reliability, responsiveness, assurance, empathy, and tangibles.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Companies:

  1. Improved Customer Satisfaction and Loyalty: CXM focuses on understanding and meeting customer needs, leading to increased satisfaction and a higher likelihood of repeat business.

  2. Enhanced Brand Reputation: Positive customer experiences contribute to a strong brand reputation, attracting new customers and retaining existing ones.

  3. Increased Revenue and Profitability: Satisfied customers are more likely to spend more, refer others, and remain loyal, all of which contribute to revenue growth.

  4. Competitive Advantage: In today's crowded marketplace, exceptional customer experience can be a key differentiator, setting a company apart from its competitors.

  5. Reduced Costs: Resolving customer issues proactively and efficiently can reduce the cost of customer service and support.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Building a Career as a Manager:

  1. In-demand Skill: CXM is a highly sought-after skill in today's business world, as companies increasingly recognize its importance.

  2. Career Advancement: Expertise in CXM can open doors to various managerial roles, such as Customer Experience Manager, Customer Success Manager, or Marketing Manager.

  3. Problem-solving Skills: CXM involves identifying and addressing customer pain points, which enhances problem-solving and analytical skills.

  4. Leadership Development: Managing customer experience initiatives requires strong leadership, communication, and collaboration skills.

  5. Cross-functional Collaboration: CXM often involves working with multiple departments, providing managers with exposure to different areas of the business.


Overall, learning CXM is crucial for companies looking to thrive in the modern business landscape. It's also a valuable investment for managers aiming to build a successful career in various industries.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in marketing and business

Hello, and welcome to our course on Employee Engagement and Employee Relations. I’m excited to have you with us as we dive into two of the most essential aspects of modern workplace dynamics.

In this course, we’ll explore the Importance of Employee Relations in the Workplace—a crucial element for fostering a cohesive and productive work environment. Strong employee relations not only promote trust and communication but also serve as the foundation for long-term organizational success.

We’ll also discuss the Role of HR in Managing Employee Relations. Human Resources plays a pivotal role in maintaining positive relationships between employees and management. We'll examine best practices, policies, and frameworks that HR professionals use to create a healthy, collaborative workplace.

Next, we’ll cover Employee Engagement—a key factor that directly influences organizational performance. We’ll explore how increased engagement leads to better productivity, innovation, and overall business outcomes.

To further support your understanding, we’ll look at Tools and Techniques for Measuring Employee Engagement. Knowing how to assess engagement levels is essential for identifying both strengths and areas for improvement. Moreover, we’ll examine Strategies for Enhancing Employee Engagement, offering practical insights and approaches to inspire commitment, enthusiasm, and motivation within your workforce.

Finally, we’ll focus on Building a Positive Work Environment, which is vital for nurturing employee satisfaction, reducing turnover, and fostering long-term loyalty.

By the end of this course, you’ll be equipped with the knowledge and tools to strengthen employee relations, boost engagement, and drive your organization’s success. Let’s begin and transform the way you approach employee engagement and relations!


Discussing employee relations and employee engagement together in one online course makes sense because both concepts are deeply interconnected and play a crucial role in creating a positive work environment and driving organizational success. Here's why it’s beneficial to cover both topics in a single course:


1. Interconnectedness of Concepts:

Employee Relations focuses on the relationship between employers and employees, encompassing everything from conflict resolution and communication to fair treatment and legal compliance. Strong employee relations are the foundation for a positive work environment where employees feel respected and valued.

Employee Engagement is about how emotionally invested and motivated employees are in their work and the organization. High levels of engagement are often the result of effective employee relations. When employees feel that their concerns are addressed, their contributions are recognized, and they are treated fairly, they are more likely to be engaged.


2. Holistic Approach to HR Management:

Combining employee relations and engagement in one course allows for a more comprehensive understanding of how to manage and motivate employees. It enables HR professionals to see the bigger picture of how managing relationships directly impacts engagement levels, and how engaged employees contribute to better employee relations.


3. Strategies for Improvement:

Discussing both topics together allows for the exploration of strategies that improve both employee relations and engagement simultaneously. For example, open communication channels and conflict resolution mechanisms can enhance both relations and engagement. Recognizing and rewarding employees also strengthens both areas.


4. Efficiency in Learning:

Since both employee relations and engagement involve overlapping areas of HR practice, addressing them in a single course makes learning more efficient. HR professionals can gain insights into how improving one area can positively impact the other, leading to a more integrated approach to workforce management.


5. Practical Application:

A combined course can provide practical tools and frameworks that address both employee relations and engagement. For example, a module on conflict resolution might not only teach how to resolve disputes but also how to turn those resolutions into opportunities for increasing employee engagement.


6. Organizational Culture and Performance:

The course can help participants understand how both employee relations and engagement contribute to building a positive organizational culture. A strong culture, in turn, enhances performance, reduces turnover, and makes the organization a more attractive place to work.


In summary, discussing employee relations and employee engagement together in one online course provides a more complete understanding of how to create a positive, productive, and motivated workforce. By learning about both areas in tandem, HR professionals can develop strategies that support a healthy work environment and drive organizational success.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at Human Resources or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.longDescription:
Introduction to Financial Products and Services


In today’s complex financial landscape, having a sound understanding of financial products and services is essential not only for professionals, aspiring financial professionals, managers, business owners, policy makers, regulators, auditors, accountants, but for anyone who wants to gain an understanding of our current world.


Who is this for?

Whether you are an aspiring financial professional, a business owner, or an individual looking to better manage your financial future, this course offers you the foundational knowledge you need to navigate the financial world with confidence.


This course is covers diverse segments of the financial services sector, various products, services, associated risks with the products and attendant benefits.


Our approach

We simplify and demystify the often intimidating world of finance by breaking down key concepts and providing examples for a wide array of financial products and services in a clear, concise manner. You will explore the various financial products available, from basic savings accounts to more complex investment vehicles like bonds, mutual funds, and insurance products.


Additionally, the course will also cover the critical products within the regulatory frameworks (Central Banks), retirement products, and much, much more.

Course Author:

Dr. Joao Martins is seasoned manager and entrepreneur, with over 30 years’ experience in top management positions in the telecommunications and IT sectors. Starting in an academic environment, where he obtained his PhD in Engineering and an MBA at Universidade Nova de Lisboa, quickly evolved to C-suite positions in the corporate environment, both in large corporations and in start-ups.

He is currently a director and start-up shareholder in an IT integrator in Lisbon, focused on cybersecurity. With a passion for education, he also an invited Professor at Nova Information Management School, teaching Knowledge Management and Financial Analysis to graduate and undergraduate students.


Business leadership is the art of guiding an organization towards success. It involves setting a clear vision, inspiring employees, and making strategic decisions that propel the company forward. Effective leaders create a positive work environment where people feel motivated and empowered to contribute their best.


Core Functions of a Business Leader:

  • Visionary: Business leaders paint a picture of the future – the company's goals and aspirations. They articulate a compelling vision that excites and unites the team.

  • Strategic Decision-Making: Leaders make tough calls, weighing risks and opportunities to navigate the business towards its goals.

  • Motivator and Coach: They inspire and empower employees, helping them grow and develop their skills.

  • Effective Communicator: Leaders clearly communicate the vision, plans, and expectations to everyone in the organization.

  • Team Builder: They foster collaboration and build strong, cohesive teams that work effectively together.


Why Leadership Skills Matter for Your Career:

Developing leadership skills is crucial for career advancement. Here's why:

  • Increased Visibility: Leaders stand out. They take initiative, solve problems, and get things done, which grabs the attention of superiors.

  • Promotion Potential: Companies are always looking for strong leaders to fill management positions.

  • Stronger Teams: If you can lead and motivate others, you'll be a valuable asset on any team, making you a desirable candidate for projects and assignments.

  • Adaptability and Change: The business world is constantly evolving. Strong leadership skills equip you to adapt to change and navigate challenges.

courseDetails.shortDescription: Compreender a Gestão de Projetos, Funções Principais, Papel de um Gestor de Projeto, Project Lifecycle, Metodologia
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bem-vindo ao Curso: Certificado Profissional em Liderança e Gestão


Curso ministrado pelo MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance.  

O MTF é um instituto global de educação e investigação, com sede em Lisboa, Portugal, focado na formação empresarial e profissional híbrida (presencial e online) nas áreas de: Negócios e Administração, Ciência e Tecnologia, Banca e Finanças.

O centro de I&D do MTF foca-se em atividades de investigação nas áreas de: Inteligência Artificial, Aprendizagem Automática (Machine Learning), Ciência de Dados, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Criptomoedas e Ativos Digitais, Metaversos, Transformação Digital, Fintech, Comércio Eletrónico e Internet das Coisas.

O MTF é parceiro oficial da IBM, Intel e Microsoft, e membro da Câmara de Comércio e Indústria Portuguesa.

O MTF está presente em 213 países e foi escolhido por mais de 560 000 alunos.


Autor do curso:

Ana Cristina M. B. Saraiva é uma profissional distinta com uma sólida combinação de experiência académica e empresarial, especializada em gestão, ética, desenvolvimento estratégico e liderança. Obteve o Doutoramento em Gestão pela Universidade Lusíada de Lisboa, onde se destacou nas áreas de gestão empresarial, e-commerce, análise crítica de modelos de gestão e metodologias de investigação avançadas, recebendo grande reconhecimento pelas suas contribuições na área.

Atualmente, exerce funções como Gestora de Projetos na Associação Portuguesa de Ética Empresarial (APEE). Este papel sublinha o seu compromisso com a promoção da inovação ética e da sustentabilidade nas organizações e nos setores público e privado.

Relativamente à sua área académica, Ana Saraiva fez contribuições significativas como consultora e investigadora no centro de investigação COMEGI da Universidade Lusíada. Colaborou com prestigiadas instituições nacionais e internacionais, incluindo o IST (Universidade de Lisboa) e várias universidades europeias, avançando na investigação e implementando soluções inovadoras nas práticas de gestão organizacionais. A sua experiência editorial inclui a gestão e indexação de revistas científicas em plataformas como Scopus, DOAJ e outras de prestígio, refletindo a sua dedicação nos elevados padrões académicos.

Com uma experiência empresarial de mais de uma década, Ana trabalhou na hotelaria de luxo, onde liderou esforços na coordenação de eventos, na garantia de qualidade e na satisfação dos hóspedes. Possui um histórico comprovado de melhoria da excelência operacional e gestão estratégica, sendo uma líder versátil e capaz de impulsionar resultados nos mais diversificados contextos.

A produção académica de Ana Saraiva é vasta, incluindo numerosos artigos revistos por pares e apresentações em conferências que abordam questões críticas em gestão, ética e transformação digital. É proficiente numa ampla gama de ferramentas e plataformas digitais, como SPSS, SAS e NVivo, utilizadas para otimizar os resultados de investigação e de negócios.

Com uma paixão pela colaboração interdisciplinar e um compromisso com práticas éticas e sustentáveis, Ana Cristina M. B. Saraiva dedica-se a capacitar organizações e indivíduos para alcançar a excelência através de soluções inovadoras e liderança responsável no panorama global dos negócios.


O que é Gestão de Projetos?

Gestão de projetos é a aplicação organizada de conhecimentos, processos, habilidades e ferramentas para guiar um projeto desde o seu início até a sua conclusão bem-sucedida. Envolve:

  • Definir metas: Decidir o que o projeto deve alcançar.

  • Planejamento: Mapear as etapas e os recursos necessários.

  • Execução: Colocar o plano em ação, direcionar a equipe e gerenciar os recursos.

  • Monitoramento e controle: Acompanhar o progresso, gerenciar mudanças e resolver problemas.

  • Encerramento: Revisar o projeto, documentar os resultados e aprender com a experiência.


O que é Gestão de Projetos de Negócios?

A gestão de projetos de negócios refere-se à aplicação de princípios de gestão de projetos em um ambiente de negócios. Esses projetos se concentram em alcançar objetivos de negócios, como:

  • Lançamento de novos produtos ou serviços

  • Melhorar ou automatizar processos de negócios

  • Reestruturar departamentos

  • Implementar novos sistemas de software


O Papel da Gestão de Projetos

A gestão de projetos desempenha um papel fundamental nas empresas porque:

  • Aumenta a Eficiência: Um plano de projeto bem definido ajuda a otimizar o trabalho e evitar o desperdício de esforço.

  • Garante Resultados: A gestão de projetos mantém o foco em cumprir as metas definidas dentro das restrições de tempo e orçamento.

  • Gerencia Riscos: Problemas potenciais são antecipados e mitigados por meio de planejamento e monitoramento cuidadosos.

  • Melhora a Comunicação: Canais de comunicação claros entre membros da equipe, stakeholders e clientes ajudam a evitar mal-entendidos.

  • Melhora a Satisfação do Cliente: A conclusão bem-sucedida do projeto dentro dos parâmetros acordados gera confiança com os clientes.


Por que aprender gestão de projetos é importante para as empresas?

As empresas investem no treinamento de gestão de projetos de seus funcionários porque:

  • Vantagem Competitiva: Empresas com fortes capacidades de gestão de projetos entregam projetos com mais sucesso, ganham reputação de confiabilidade e superam os concorrentes.

  • Reduz Custos: Projetos ineficientes custam mais devido a atrasos e desperdício de recursos. A gestão de projetos ajuda a otimizar os recursos.

  • Melhora o Moral dos Funcionários: Projetos bem administrados minimizam o estresse, melhoram a colaboração da equipe e criam um senso de realização.

  • Melhora a Inovação: A gestão de projetos estruturada permite gerenciar projetos de inovação, levando a uma cultura de inovação dentro da empresa.


Como as habilidades de gerenciamento de projetos impulsionam sua carreira

Desenvolver suas habilidades de gerenciamento de projetos pode melhorar significativamente suas perspectivas de carreira:

  • Alta Demanda: Gerentes de projeto são procurados em todos os setores, como TI, construção, saúde, etc.

  • Melhor Salário: Gerentes de projeto qualificados geralmente ganham salários mais altos devido à sua experiência.

  • Potencial de Liderança: A gestão de projetos fornece uma base sólida para assumir funções de liderança dentro das organizações.

  • Versatilidade: As habilidades de gerenciamento de projetos se aplicam a uma ampla gama de empregos e funções, não apenas a cargos de gerenciamento de projetos.

  • Crescimento Pessoal: Você desenvolverá habilidades organizacionais, de resolução de problemas e de comunicação, tornando-se um trunfo para qualquer equipe.
targetAudiences: Sem requisitos especiais. Um curso para qualquer pessoa que queira construir uma carreira em Gestão

Global Wealth Management and Private Banking (GWMPB) are specialized financial services catering to high-net-worth individuals (HNWIs) and ultra-high-net-worth individuals (UHNWIs). These services extend beyond traditional banking and encompass a comprehensive suite of financial solutions tailored to the unique needs and objectives of affluent clients.

Global Wealth Management focuses on managing and growing the wealth of HNWIs through a diverse range of investment strategies, including portfolio management, asset allocation, risk management, and financial planning. This holistic approach aims to preserve and enhance clients' wealth over the long term while addressing their specific financial goals, such as retirement planning, estate planning, and tax optimization.

Private Banking offers personalized banking services to HNWIs and UHNWIs. These services include bespoke banking solutions, exclusive investment opportunities, concierge services, and access to a dedicated relationship manager who understands their unique financial circumstances and aspirations. Private banks often act as trusted advisors, guiding clients through complex financial matters and providing tailored solutions to meet their evolving needs.

courseDetails.shortDescription: Master communication essentials: active listening, persuasive speaking, conflict resolution, and clarity.

In today's fast-paced world, effective communication skills are more critical than ever. Whether in the workplace, social settings, or personal relationships, the ability to convey ideas clearly, listen actively, and engage with others is essential for success and fulfillment. This comprehensive course is designed to equip participants with the essential skills and strategies needed to communicate confidently and effectively in any situation.

Course Objectives:

  • Understand the fundamental principles of effective communication

  • Learn techniques for active listening and empathetic understanding

  • Develop clarity and precision in verbal and written communication

  • Master the art of nonverbal communication and body language

  • Enhance interpersonal skills for building rapport and fostering positive relationships

  • Learn strategies for managing conflicts and resolving misunderstandings

  • Develop assertiveness and confidence in expressing thoughts and opinions

  • Explore cultural differences and communication styles for effective cross-cultural interactions

  • Discover techniques for delivering impactful presentations and public speaking

  • Develop practical communication strategies for professional and personal success

Course Content:

    • Strategies for understanding others' perspectives

  3. Verbal and Written Communication Skills:

    • Writing effectively for different audiences

  4. Nonverbal Communication and Body Language:

  8. Presentation Skills and Public Speaking:

  9. Professional and Personal Success Strategies:

Course Format:

Who Should Attend:

Effective communication is the cornerstone of success in both professional and personal realms. Dr. Joao Martins is seasoned manager and entrepreneur, with over 30 years’ experience in top management positions in the telecommunications and IT sectors. Starting in an academic environment, where he obtained his PhD in Engineering and an MBA at Universidade Nova de Lisboa, quickly evolved to C-suite positions in the corporate environment, both in large corporations and in start-ups.

He is currently a director and start-up shareholder in an IT integrator in Lisbon, focused on cybersecurity. With a passion for education, he also an invited Professor at Nova Information Management School, teaching Knowledge Management and Financial Analysis to graduate and undergraduate students.


Entrepreneurship is the process of identifying opportunities, innovating, and taking risks to create and manage a business venture. It involves the willingness to bear uncertainty and the capacity to adapt to changing circumstances in order to achieve success. Entrepreneurs are individuals who embark on this journey, utilizing their creativity, vision, and determination to bring their ideas to life.

There are several main reasons why individuals choose to become entrepreneurs and build their own businesses:

  1. Pursuit of Passion: Many entrepreneurs are driven by a passion for a particular idea, product, or service. They want to bring their vision to fruition and make a meaningful impact in their chosen field.

  2. Financial Independence: Building a successful business can provide financial freedom and independence. Entrepreneurs have the opportunity to create wealth for themselves and their families by capitalizing on their own ideas and hard work.

  3. Flexibility and Autonomy: Entrepreneurship offers the flexibility to set one's own schedule and work on projects that align with personal values and goals. Entrepreneurs have the autonomy to make decisions and shape the direction of their businesses as they see fit.

  4. Desire for Innovation: Entrepreneurship is often driven by a desire to innovate and create something new. Entrepreneurs seek to solve problems, disrupt industries, and introduce novel solutions that improve people's lives.

  5. Personal Growth and Fulfillment: Building a business can be a deeply rewarding experience that fosters personal growth and fulfillment. Entrepreneurs face challenges, overcome obstacles, and learn valuable lessons along the way, which can lead to a sense of accomplishment and fulfillment.


Learning about business can provide essential knowledge and skills that support the process of building a career and launching a startup. Some ways in which learning about business can be beneficial include:

  1. Understanding Market Dynamics: A solid understanding of business principles can help entrepreneurs identify market opportunities, assess demand for their products or services, and develop effective strategies for reaching their target audience.

  2. Financial Management: Learning about finance and accounting is crucial for managing the financial aspects of a business, including budgeting, forecasting, and managing cash flow. This knowledge is essential for making informed decisions and ensuring the financial health of a startup.

  3. Marketing and Sales: Effective marketing and sales strategies are essential for attracting customers and growing a business. Learning about marketing principles, branding, and customer acquisition can help entrepreneurs develop strategies to effectively promote their products or services and drive sales.

  4. Leadership and Management: Learning about leadership and management principles can help entrepreneurs build and lead high-performing teams, delegate tasks effectively, and create a positive work culture within their organizations.

Overall, learning about business can provide entrepreneurs with the knowledge, skills, and confidence they need to navigate the challenges of entrepreneurship, build successful businesses, and achieve their goals.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at business or improve their knowledge.

The aviation, airline, air transportation, and airport industries form a complex and interconnected ecosystem that extends far beyond pilots, flight attendants, and air traffic controllers. A deep understanding of this ecosystem can open doors to a surprising array of career opportunities, both within and outside the industry itself.


Why Study Aviation, Airlines, Air Transportation, and Airports?

  • Understanding a Global Network: Aviation is a global industry that connects people, cultures, and economies. Learning about its operations provides insights into international business, logistics, supply chain management, and cross-cultural communication.

  • Technological Innovation: The aviation sector is at the forefront of technological advancements. Studying it exposes you to cutting-edge developments in aircraft design, navigation systems, artificial intelligence, data analytics, and sustainability initiatives.

  • Business and Management Skills: The industry offers diverse business models, from legacy airlines to low-cost carriers, airports, and maintenance providers. Studying these models enhances your understanding of strategic management, marketing, finance, and operations.

  • Regulatory and Policy Framework: Aviation is highly regulated for safety and security reasons. Understanding this framework is valuable for careers in law, policymaking, compliance, and risk management.

  • Sustainability and Environmental Impact: The industry is actively addressing its environmental footprint. Studying its sustainability efforts prepares you for careers in environmental consulting, renewable energy, and corporate social responsibility.


Who Benefits from Aviation Knowledge?

  • Engineers and Technicians: Design, maintain, and improve aircraft, airport infrastructure, and air traffic control systems.

  • Data Scientists and Analysts: Analyze passenger data, optimize flight schedules, and develop predictive models for maintenance and safety.

  • Marketing and Sales Professionals: Develop marketing campaigns, manage customer relationships, and promote aviation services.

  • Financial Analysts and Accountants: Manage budgets, analyze financial performance, and make investment decisions.

  • Legal and Compliance Professionals: Ensure regulatory compliance, draft contracts, and handle legal matters related to aviation.

  • Business Consultants: Advise airlines, airports, and other industry players on strategy, operations, and technology.


Linked Domains Where Aviation Knowledge is an Asset:

  • Tourism and Hospitality: Understand the needs of airline passengers, develop travel packages, and manage airport hotels and services.

  • Logistics and Supply Chain: Coordinate the movement of cargo, manage airport logistics, and ensure timely delivery of goods.

  • Manufacturing: Produce aircraft components, engines, and other aviation-related equipment.

  • Government and Regulatory Agencies: Develop aviation policies, enforce regulations, and promote safety and security.

  • Media and Journalism: Report on aviation news, analyze industry trends, and communicate complex information to the public.


Whether you aspire to a career directly within the aviation industry or in a related field, gaining a comprehensive understanding of aviation, airlines, air transportation, and airports is a strategic investment in your professional future. It equips you with a versatile skill set that is highly sought after in today's globalized and technology-driven economy.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at Aviation, Airlines, Air Transportation and Airports or improve their knowledge.

Course Author:

Mr. Joao Martins is seasoned manager and entrepreneur, with over 30 years’ experience in top management positions in the telecommunications and IT sectors. Starting in an academic environment, where he obtained his PhD in Engineering and an MBA at Universidade Nova de Lisboa, quickly evolved to C-suite positions in the corporate environment, both in large corporations and in start-ups.

He is currently a director and start-up shareholder in an IT integrator in Lisbon, focused on cybersecurity. With a passion for education, he also an invited Professor at Nova Information Management School, teaching Knowledge Management and Financial Analysis to graduate and undergraduate students.


Course focuses:

Financial Statement Analysis will help business owners and other interested people to analyze the data in financial statements to provide them with better information about such key factors for decision making and ultimate business survival.


Financial Statement Analysis is the collective name for the tools and techniques that are intended to provide relevant information to the decision makers. The purpose of the FSA is to assess the financial health and performance of the company.


FSA consist of the comparisons for the same company over the period of time and comparisons of different companies either in the same industry or in different industries.


WHY IS IT IMPORTANT:

Financial statement analysis involves analyzing the information provided in the financial statements to:


Provide information about the organization's:

  • Past performance

  • Present condition

  • Future performance


Assess the organization's:

  • Earnings in terms of power, persistence, quality and growth

  • Solvency


Plan of lessons:

1. Accounting methods

- Introduction

- What is an account.

- Debit and credit operations

- Double entry accounting


2. Accounting Standards

- End of Period operations

- Introducing the financial statements


3. Financial Statements

- Main financial statements

- Interpreting the statements


4. Financial Statements

- Financial ratios

- Interpreting the ratios


5. Valuation principles

- Cost, Market and DCF

- DCF methodology

- WACC


6. Valuation principles

- 6 steps of DCF

- Terminal values

- Enterprise and equity values


Financial analysis is the process of evaluating businesses, projects, budgets, and other finance-related entities to determine their performance and suitability. It involves using various tools and techniques to assess the financial health of an organization, forecast future trends, and support decision-making.  


Key aspects of financial analysis include:

Assessing profitability: Evaluating a company's ability to generate profits over time, considering revenues, costs, and expenses.

Analyzing liquidity: Determining an organization's capacity to meet its short-term financial obligations and maintain sufficient cash flow.

Examining solvency: Assessing a company's long-term financial stability and ability to repay its debts.

Evaluating efficiency: Measuring how effectively a company utilizes its resources to generate revenues and manage expenses.

Forecasting future performance: Projecting financial outcomes based on historical data, market trends, and other relevant factors.


Importance of financial analysis skills for your career:

Improved decision-making: Financial analysis skills enable you to make informed decisions based on solid financial data, rather than relying on intuition or guesswork. This is crucial for choosing investments, managing budgets, and identifying growth opportunities.

Enhanced problem-solving: By understanding financial statements and analyzing trends, you can pinpoint areas of weakness or inefficiency within an organization and develop strategies to address them.

Increased career opportunities: Financial analysis skills are in high demand across various industries, opening doors to roles such as financial analyst, investment banker, portfolio manager, or management consultant.

Competitive advantage: Possessing strong financial analysis skills can differentiate you from other candidates in the job market and increase your earning potential.


Importance of financial analysis skills for building your own business:

Effective financial management: Understanding your company's financial performance is essential for making strategic decisions about pricing, marketing, product development, and resource allocation.

Securing funding: Investors and lenders rely on financial analysis to assess the viability and potential return on investment of your business. A strong financial track record and well-prepared financial projections can significantly increase your chances of securing funding.

Sustainable growth: By monitoring key financial metrics and identifying potential risks, you can make proactive adjustments to ensure the long-term sustainability and growth of your business.

Improved profitability: Financial analysis can help you identify areas where you can cut costs, increase revenues, and optimize your pricing strategy, ultimately leading to improved profitability.


In conclusion, financial analysis is a critical skill set that can significantly impact your career trajectory and your ability to build a successful business. Whether you're working for a large corporation or starting your own venture, honing your financial analysis skills can empower you to make informed decisions, solve complex problems, and achieve your financial goals.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at business or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.title: Microsoft Excel Eğitimi | Başlangıçtan İleri Seviyeye
courseDetails.shortDescription: İleri Seviye Excel Kullanıcısı Olmak İçin A'dan Z'ye Her Şeyi (Tablolar, Grafikler, Formüller, Tasarımlar...) Öğrenelim!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Merhaba arkadaşlar,


Bu alanda sizlere Microsoft Excel kullanmanın avantajlarından bahsetmeyeceğim, şu an bu veya benzeri kursları inceliyorsanız böyle bir bilgilendirmeye ihtiyacınızın olduğunu düşünmüyorum ancak bu eğitimin içeriğine ve eğitimden maksimum fayda sağlayabilmek için uygulayabileceğiniz birkaç küçük bilgiye değinmek istiyorum.


Excel eğitim kursumuz, kurs içeriğinden de anlaşılacağı üzere teorik ve pratik kabiliyet kazandırıp öğrenme sürecinin pekiştirilebilmesi açısından tıpkı lise, üniversite ders müfredatlarında olduğu gibi belirli bir disiplin ve metodik sıralı hiyerarşiye bağlı kalarak hazırlanmıştır. Yani emeklemeden koşturmaya yönelik gereksiz ve zorlayıcı bir sürecin içinde olmayacaksınız.


Bununla birlikte kursumuz 28 saat uzunluğunda olup içinde 22 bölüm, 217 ders, 180 formül, +1.000 benzersiz bilgi, +1.000 örnek/genel tekrar, başlangıç ve bitiş aşamasında olmak üzere 2 adet Seviye Tespit Sınavı, 70 adet egzersiz dosyası barındırmaktadır.


Yine hem kurs isminden hem de içindekiler öğelerinden de anlaşılacağı üzere eğitim kursumuz, temelden yani başlangıçtan ileri seviyeye olmak üzere her seviyeye hitap edebilecek şekilde mümkün olduğunca basit ancak detaylı, aceleden uzak tane tane anlatım metodu benimsenerek hazırlanmıştır. Bu açıdan eğer iyi bildiğinizi düşündüğünüz bir ders veya konu varsa ilgili dersi pas geçmek de bir tercih olsa da bu yolu tercih etmenizi tavsiye etmiyorum. Her ne kadar derslerin açıklama kısmında ilgili derslerin içerikleri paylaşılmış olsa da dersin işlenme aşamasında farklı konu ve noktalara değinilmiş olabilir. Öte yandan hem bu tercih yerine (yani dersi izlemeden pas geçmek) hem de hem de video akışını kendi anlama ve öğrenme alışkanlığınıza uygun olarak kalibre edebilmek adına ders videolarının hızını arttırmayı ya da azaltmayı birinci seçenek olarak değerlendirmeniz yararınıza olacaktır.


Öğrenme sürecinize pozitif etki edebilecek bazı tavsiyeler de vermek istiyorum.


  • Konsantre olun. Ders videolarını izlerken konsantrasyonunuzu olumsuz etkileyecek faktörleri minimize etmelisiniz.

  • Not alın. Zorlandığınız veya karıştırdığınız noktalarda basit ve adım adım notlar almanız yazım esnasında da size tekrar etme imkanı vereceğinden etkili olacaktır.

  • Pratik yapın. Ders videolarının önemli bir kısmında pratik yapabilmeniz için ilgili derse ait egzersiz dosyaları bulunmaktadır. Hem bu dosyalar üzerinden hem de farklı kaynaklardan bulacağınız örneklerle bol bol pratik yapmanız öğrenme sürecinizin kısalmasına büyük katkı verecektir.

  • Farklı kaynaklardan da yararlanın. Yalnızca bu ders içeriğinde alacağınız bilgilerle yetinmeyin, farklı kaynaklar üzerinden de araştırma yapmanız, video izlemeniz hem tekrar etme ve pratik yapma imkanı sunacak hem de bilgi dağarcığınızı zenginleştirecektir.

  • Ders videolarının hızını arttırın. Ders videolarını izledikten sonra hızı arttırarak tekrar izlemek dersin pekiştirilmesi açısından önemli katkı verecektir.

  • Disiplinli olun. Bu aşamada size verebileceğim en önemli tavsiyem azimli ve disiplinli olmanızdır. Kendinize göre periyodik bir planlama yaparak düzenli bir biçimde dersleri izlemeniz, araştırmanız, azami derecede pratik yapmanız son derece önemlidir. Zira herhangi bir kaynaktan alacağınız bilgi hap niteliğinde değildir, takviyedir. Bu takviye ancak azim ve disiplin ile birleştiği takdirde öğrenme hızınızı ve becerinizi maksimize edecektir.


Excel kullanım kabiliyetinizin ileri seviye olarak değerlendirilmesi konusunda dünya genelinde kabul görmüş standartlar bulunmamaktadır. Bununla birlikte ileri seviye Excel kullanıcısı olmak için aslında öne çıkan iki parametre vardır; hız ve bilgi. Bu açıdan öncelikli hedefimiz bilgi birikimimizi arttırmak sonrasında ise bol pratik ile hızlanmak olmalıdır. İleri seviye Excel kullanıcısı olabilmeniz için bilginizi ve hızınızı arttıracak tüm girdileri bu eğitim kursumuzda bulabileceksiniz.


Öte yandan başlangıç ve bitiş sınavları ile birlikte kat ettiğiniz mesafeyi eğitimin sonunda kendiniz de görebileceksiniz.


Umarım keyifli ve faydalı bir eğitim süreci olur, sağlıcakla:)
targetAudiences: Microsoft Excel kullanımını öğrenmek ya da mevcut deneyimini/seviyesini ilerletmek isteyen herkes katılım gösterebilir.

courseDetails.title: Executive Certificate in Digital Transformation
courseDetails.shortDescription: Principles and Foundations of Digital Transformation in Business and Specific Domains
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to program: Executive Certificate in Digital Transformation


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 210 countries and has been chosen by more than 520 000 students.


Course Author:

Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.

In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses on to wide range of students from undergraduate level to business students of professional and executives courses. Currently, at EIMT in Zurich, Switzerland, she lectures for doctoral students, offering advanced instruction in research design and methodologies, and in MTF Institute Ms. Amoroso is leading Product Development academical domain.

In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.

Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.



The Executive Certificate in Digital Transformation offered by MTF Institute of Management, Technology & Finance is a comprehensive program designed to equip executives and managers with the knowledge and skills needed to lead successful digital transformations within their organizations. In business landscape, digital transformation has become a critical strategic imperative for companies across all industries. This program aims to provide participants with a deep understanding of digital technologies, their impact on businesses, and effective strategies for leveraging them to drive growth and innovation.


Importance of Education in Digital Transformation for Companies and Managers:

In the  business environment, digital transformation has emerged as a key driver of competitive advantage and long-term success. Embracing digital technologies is no longer an option but a necessity for companies to remain relevant and thrive. However, implementing digital transformation initiatives requires more than just adopting new tools; it demands a comprehensive understanding of digital trends, customer behavior, data analytics, and organizational change management. This education helps companies and managers:


Strategic Adaptation: Digital transformation education empowers organizations to align their strategies with the opportunities and challenges presented by the digital age. It helps leaders identify potential areas for disruption and develop agile responses to stay ahead of the competition.


Enhanced Customer Experience: Understanding digital transformation enables businesses to design and deliver exceptional customer experiences, which are crucial for customer retention and loyalty in today's customer-centric market.


Data-Driven Decision Making: The course equips managers with skills in data analysis and interpretation, enabling them to make data-driven decisions that lead to improved business outcomes.


Innovation and Creativity: Participants will learn about emerging technologies and innovation processes, fostering a culture of creativity within their organizations and driving continuous improvement.


Organizational Resilience: With digital transformation education, managers can build resilient organizations capable of adapting to disruptions and thriving in times of uncertainty.


Importance of Digital Transformation Education for Building a Career:

In the competitive job market, professionals with expertise in digital transformation are in high demand across various industries. Building a career with a strong foundation in digital transformation can open up numerous opportunities for individuals:


Competitive Advantage: Having a recognized qualification in digital transformation sets job seekers apart from others in the job market, giving them a competitive edge when applying for leadership positions.


Career Progression: As companies prioritize digital transformation to remain competitive, they seek managers and leaders with expertise in this area. Earning an executive diploma in digital transformation can lead to career advancement and promotion.


Versatility: Digital transformation knowledge is valuable across industries, allowing professionals to explore diverse career paths and contribute to different sectors.


High-impact Roles: Graduates can secure roles that involve leading digital transformation initiatives, making strategic decisions, and driving organizational change, thereby playing a crucial role in shaping their company's future.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at business or improve their knowledge.

Despite its usefulness, many specialists shy away from using Excel because of its complex formulas and functions. That’s why we’ve created a course designed to break down Excel to its basics and allow you to integrate it into your daily work.


Our course quickly and effectively covers the essentials of Excel in four sections:

From understanding the interface to creating charts and visualizing data, we’ve got you covered.


COURSE INSTRUCTOR

Throughout the course, you’ll have access to many examples and files with keyboard shortcuts to make learning even easier. With this course, you’ll be able to use Excel like a professional and gain the foundational knowledge required by most employers.

  • Our course is taught by top professionals with over 14 years of experience in online marketing. Our Webpromo Agency has both Google Premier Partner status and Facebook Marketing Partner status.

  • With over 500,000 digital marketing specialists worldwide enrolled in our online courses, we’re dedicated to helping the SkillsBooster community stay up-to-date with the latest tips and trends in digital marketing.


OUR EXCEL TRAINING INCLUDES:

  • Practice Materials: Checklists, templates, and video tutorials to make the course more interactive and valuable.

  • Lifetime Access to the course and any future updates.

  • Students' Support: To ensure that you get the most out of your learning experience.

  • After successfully completing the course, participants receive an Udemy certificate.

STILL WORRIED?

If you’re unsatisfied with the course, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee.


Enroll now and start simplifying your data management tasks with Excel!

courseDetails.title: Certificado Profissional em Liderança e Gestão
courseDetails.shortDescription: Certificado Profissional em Liderança e Gestão, Planeamento e Tomada de Decisão, Gestão nas Organizações
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bem-vindo ao Curso: Certificado Profissional em Liderança e Gestão


Curso ministrado pelo MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance.  

O MTF é um instituto global de educação e investigação, com sede em Lisboa, Portugal, focado na formação empresarial e profissional híbrida (presencial e online) nas áreas de: Negócios e Administração, Ciência e Tecnologia, Banca e Finanças.

O centro de I&D do MTF foca-se em atividades de investigação nas áreas de: Inteligência Artificial, Aprendizagem Automática (Machine Learning), Ciência de Dados, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Criptomoedas e Ativos Digitais, Metaversos, Transformação Digital, Fintech, Comércio Eletrónico e Internet das Coisas.

O MTF é parceiro oficial da IBM, Intel e Microsoft, e membro da Câmara de Comércio e Indústria Portuguesa.

O MTF está presente em 210 países e foi escolhido por mais de 520 000 alunos.


Autor do curso:

O Dr. Pedro Nunes construiu uma carreira multifacetada, combinando com sucesso o mundo académico com a experiência prática no mundo dos negócios. A sua formação culminou com um Doutoramento em Análise Económica e Estratégia Empresarial, com menção "cum laude", pela Universidade de Santiago de Compostela.

Profissionalmente, o Dr. Nunes navegou por diversos setores, incluindo tecnologia, comércio internacional e consultoria, desempenhando funções que vão desde analista de negócios até diretor. Atualmente, aplica a sua vasta experiência na indústria e os seus conhecimentos académicos como Professor em vários programas de DBA, contribuindo para a formação da próxima geração de profissionais.


Definição e Importância da Gestão

Gestão é o processo de coordenar e supervisionar as atividades de uma organização para alcançar seus objetivos


Envolve planear, organizar, liderar e controlar recursos, incluindo humanos, financeiros e materiais, para garantir

operações eficientes e eficazes.


Elementos-chave da gestão:

  • Planeamento: Definir objetivos e determinar o melhor curso de ação para alcançá-los.

  • Organizar: Organizar recursos e tarefas de forma estruturada para atingir os objetivos.

  • Liderar: Direcionar e motivar as pessoas a trabalharem em prol dos objetivos da organização.

  • Controlo: Monitorizar e avaliar o progresso para garantir que os objetivos são atingidos.


Importância da Gestão:

  • Atingir Metas: A Gestão ajuda as organizações a definir e atingir os seus objetivos, garantindo que todas as atividades estão alinhadas com os resultados desejados.

  • Otimização de recursos: A gestão eficiente garante que os recursos são utilizados de forma eficaz, minimizando o desperdício e maximizando a produtividade.

  • Adaptabilidade e Inovação: As boas práticas de gestão permitem que as organizações se adaptem a ambientes em mudança e fomentem a inovação.

  • Motivação e Desenvolvimento dos Colaboradores: Uma gestão eficaz envolve liderar e motivar os colaboradores, o que aumenta a satisfação no trabalho e o crescimento pessoal.

  • Vantagem competitiva: Práticas de gestão sólidas dão às organizações uma vantagem competitiva, melhorando a eficiência, a produtividade e o desempenho geral.


LIDERANÇA:


Definição geral: A liderança pode ser vista como a arte de motivar um grupo de pessoas a atingir um objetivo comum. Implica não só a gestão de recursos, mas também inspirar e moldar o futuro das organizações.


Âmbito:  A aula abordará os aspectos fundamentais da liderança, incluindo a sua definição, significado e as várias abordagens teóricas que têm sido desenvolvidas ao longo do tempo.


Relevância moderna: A liderança é fundamentalmente uma questão de influência. Envolve a capacidade de um indivíduo para inspirar, motivar e permitir que outros contribuam para a eficácia e o sucesso da organização.


Desafios: No atual ambiente em rápida mudança, marcado pela globalização, avanços tecnológicos e desafios éticos complexos, a liderança torna-se cada vez mais crítica.


A IMPORTÂNCIA DA LIDERANÇA NAS ORGANIZAÇÕES:
